00021 class RelationWriter
00022 {
00023     public:
00024         RelationWriter(OsmData *data, QIODevice *output, SrtmDownloader *downloader);
00025         void writeRelations();
00026     private:
00027         void processWay(OsmWay *way);
00028         void calcUpDown(float from_lat, float from_lon, float to_lat, float to_lon, float *up, float *down);
00029         void calc(OsmNodeId from, OsmNodeId to, float *length, float *up, float *down);
00030         void writeRelation(OsmWayId wayId, OsmNodeId startNode, OsmNodeId endNode,
00031             float length, float up, float down);
00032         //Inlined for performance reasons
00033         float distance(float from_lat, float from_lon, float to_lat, float to_lon) {
00034             //Distances are small => Assume earth is flat in this region to simplify calculation and avoid rounding errors that easily get very large with great circle distance calculations
00035             float delta_lat = (to_lat - from_lat) * 111.11; //TODO: Exact value
00036             float delta_lon = (to_lon - from_lon) * 111.11 * cos(to_lat/360.0*2.0*M_PI);
00037             return sqrt(delta_lat*delta_lat + delta_lon*delta_lon);
00038         }
00039         OsmData *data;
00040         QIODevice *output;
00041         SrtmDownloader *downloader;
00042         OsmRelationId relationId;
00043 };
